content:
The Earth System Data Science (ESDS) initiative is organizing a series of collaborative work sessions where scientists and software engineers can collaborate on shared analysis workflow problems. Our goal is to encourage cross-lab collaboration and build lasting science-software partnerships. Collaborators external to NCAR/UCAR are very welcome.

The first session, titled “Working with Unstructured Grids”, will be held on Monday April 17, 2023 from 1-4pm MT, substituting the bi-weekly ESDS Forum.

MORE INFO: See this Google Doc.

WHEN: April 17, 2023, 1-4pm MT (Google Calendar Link)
Optional social hour to follow for in person participants: 4-5pm at Under/Southern Sun (TBD)

Please use the calendar invite linked above for the virtual meeting link

WHO: Anyone who is working on, thinking about, or interested in this topic!
Just a reminder that this is today at 1pm in the Damon Room. Hope to see some of you in person. See this slideshow for a list of project ideas
